Title: Enacts the New York state kratom consumer protection act
Summary: Relates to enacting the New York state kratom consumer protection act; relates to labeling and other requirements for the sale of kratom products.
LawCode: Amd Art 13-F Art Head, §1399-aa, add §§1399-gg-1 - 1399-gg-3 & 1399-mm-4, Pub Health L; add §471-g, Tax L
